web.cliente
Class HttpClient

java.lang.Object
  web.cliente.NetworkClient
      web.cliente.HttpClient
public class HttpClient
extends NetworkClient

The underlying network client used by WebClient.

Taken from Core Servlets and JavaServer Pages from Prentice Hall and Sun Microsystems Press, http://www.coreservlets.com/. © 2000 Marty Hall; may be freely used or adapted.

Method Detail

handleConnection

protected void handleConnection(java.net.Socket uriSocket)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from class: NetworkClient
This is the method you will override when making a network client for your task. The default version sends a single line ("Generic Network Client") to the server, reads one line of response, prints it, then exits.

Overrides:
handleConnection in class NetworkClient
Throws:
java.io.IOException
